Article CARDINAL - CARDINAL of the Code of Civil Procedure of GPE envisages that a court must suspend proceedings if it is impossible to examine the case until determination of another case which is examined in civil , criminal or administrative procedure . According to LAW , in such a situation the proceedings are suspended until the decision , on which the proceedings depend , became final .
